item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys, Night One: Winners List (Updating Live)
item.description: Julianne Nicholson and Bryan Cranston are among the night’s early winners for ‘Hacks’ and ‘The Studio,’ respectively.

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys, Night One: Winners List (Updating Live)

item.title: Corporation for Public Broadcasting to Receive 2025 Governors Award at Creative Arts Emmys
item.description: And boy, does it need the gold right now.
